note: Poet, physicist, former engineer, former adjunct in Pathology and Molecular Med at Queen's (Kingston). Semi-retired consulting scientist living on a small island off Canada's west coast. Actor, improvisor, writer, kayaker, sailor, hiker, father. Current projects: computational physics (multi-particle Schrodinger's equation), local community theatre group, kayaking, hiking, carpentry, reading (eclectic), low-flow deep well pump design, SIRS modelling of covid. (he/him)
